glsa.title: JasPer: Multiple Vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in JasPer, the worst of which could could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: JasPer is a software-based implementation of the codec specified in the JPEG-2000 Part-1 standard.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in JasPer. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted file using JasPer, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All jasper users should upgrade to the latest version:
